import{WORDS}from'../constants/wordlist';import{VALIDGUESSES}from'../constants/validGuesses';import{CONFIG}from'../constants/config';export var isWordInWordList=function isWordInWordList(word){return WORDS.includes(word)||VALIDGUESSES.includes(word);};export var isWinningWord=function isWinningWord(word){return solution===word;};export var getWordOfDay=function getWordOfDay(){// January 1, 2022 Game Epoch
var epochMs=new Date(CONFIG.startDate).valueOf();var now=Date.now();var msInDay=86400000;var index=Math.floor((now-epochMs)/msInDay);var nextday=(index+1)*msInDay+epochMs;return{solution:WORDS[index%WORDS.length],solutionIndex:index,tomorrow:nextday};};var _getWordOfDay=getWordOfDay(),solution=_getWordOfDay.solution,solutionIndex=_getWordOfDay.solutionIndex,tomorrow=_getWordOfDay.tomorrow;export{solution,solutionIndex,tomorrow};
